contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Marginal''' may refer to: * For ''marginal constituency'' in politics, see “[[Marginal seat]]” * For the manga, see [[Marginal (manga)]] * For ''marginal model'' in hierarchical linear modeling, see “[[Marginal model]]” * For ''marginal observables'' in physics, see “[[Renormalization group]]” * For ''marginal person'' in sociology, see “[[Marginalization]]” * For ''marginal plant'' see [[Bog Garden]] * For ''Marginal'' crust band from Belgium, see “[[Marginal (Crust band)]]” * For ''marginal probability'' in probability theory, see “[[Marginal distribution]]” * For economic concepts, see “[[Marginalism]]”, and the various articles to which “[[Marginal concepts]]” is linked == See also == * [[Margin (disambiguation)]] * [[Marginalization]] {{disambig}}
